remarks: The scalar product of a nonnegative real and a positive operator is a positive operator.  Exercise 1(ii) of [Retherford] p. 49.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: leopmuli $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ T e. HrmOp ) /\ ( 0 <_ A /\ 0hop <_op T ) ) -> 0hop <_op ( A .op T ) ) $.
